attributes.additional_details: Immediate decisive action needs to be taken by UK and NATO Forces to prevent the spread of the Ebola virus. All affected areas need to be cordoned appropriately and for further supply of medical and sanitation resources to be imported. Individuals who have travelled to the area recently and have returned to other countries must be correctly screened and quarantined accordingly. UK Border Forces must employ tighter controls to ensure that the virus cannot enter the UK either through legal or illegal migration. A ban on all industrial action must be put into place while this threat is imminent to protect all residents within the UK.

rejection.details: Please see: Tighter Border restrictions to prevent Ebola outbreak
